Title: War of the Worlds
Writer: Josh Friedman (screenplay), David Koepp (screenplay), H.G. Wells (novel)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Dakota Fanning, Miranda Otto, Justin Chatwin
Plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival in this sci-fi action film.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 45 nominations.
